actions.text: Hall (OH) amendment (A009) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Hall (OH) amendment (A009) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 263 - 157 (Roll no. 424).

description: Amendment increases the allocation to the Child Survival and Disease Fund by $108 million.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 of Part II of House Rept. 103-147, to increase the funds appropriated in the bill for the Child Survival and Disease Fund by $108 million. The amendment would offset the increase by transferring funds from Economic Support and Development Assistance programs.
